mapper.sql: id, content,`desc`, title, status, updateTime, createTime, uuid,sourceType,sourceUrl
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from n_document
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into n_document (id, content, title, status, updateTime, createTime, uuid,`desc`,sourceType,sourceUrl) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into n_document
id,
content,
title,
status,
updateTime,
createTime,
uuid,
`desc`,
sourceType,
sourceUrl,

#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select count(*) from n_document

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 ORDER BY d.id DESC limit 5

SELECT id, uuid, title, `desc`, CASE sourceType WHEN 1 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 2 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 3 THEN 'href' WHEN 4 THEN 'vedio' WHEN 5 THEN 'dz' WHEN 6 THEN 'qt' WHEN 7 THEN 'nhvedio' END AS type FROM n_document WHERE `status` = 1 AND sourceType IN (1,2)
AND id<(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ORDER BY id DESC limit 7

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND d.sourceType IN (1,2,3) ORDER BY d.id DESC limit 5

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND id<(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND d.sourceType IN (1,2,3) ORDER BY d.id desc limit 5

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND d.sourceType = 6 ORDER BY d.id DESC limit 5

SELECT id, uuid, title, `desc`, CASE sourceType WHEN 1 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 2 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 3 THEN 'href' WHEN 4 THEN 'vedio' WHEN 5 THEN 'dz' WHEN 6 THEN 'qt' WHEN 7 THEN 'nhvedio' END AS type FROM n_document WHERE `status` = 1 AND sourceType = 6
AND id<(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ORDER BY id DESC limit 7

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND d.sourceType = 5 ORDER BY d.id DESC limit 5

SELECT id, uuid, title, `desc`, CASE sourceType WHEN 1 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 2 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 3 THEN 'href' WHEN 4 THEN 'vedio' WHEN 5 THEN 'dz' WHEN 6 THEN 'qt' WHEN 7 THEN 'nhvedio' END AS type FROM n_document WHERE `status` = 1 AND sourceType = 5
AND id<(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ORDER BY id DESC limit 7

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND id>(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND d.sourceType IN (1,2,3) ORDER BY d.id limit 5

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND id>(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND d.sourceType = 6 ORDER BY d.id limit 5

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND id>(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND d.sourceType = 5 ORDER BY d.id limit 5

SELECT d.id, d.content, d.`desc`, d.title, d.status, d.updateTime, d.createTime, d.uuid, d.sourceType, d.sourceUrl, (SELECT count(1) FROM y_file f WHERE f.docId = d.id AND d.status = 1) AS imageSize FROM n_document d WHERE d.`status` = 1 AND id>(SELECT id FROM n_document WHERE uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY d.id limit 5
SELECT id,uuid,title,`desc` from n_document WHERE sourceType in (1,2) AND status = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT id,uuid,title,`desc` from n_document WHERE sourceType = 6 AND status = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT id,uuid,title,`desc` from n_document WHERE sourceType = 5 AND status = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT url,`key`,isLocalFile AS isLocalImage FROM y_file WHERE docId = #{docId};
SELECT max(id) FROM n_document;

SELECT id, uuid, title, `desc`, CASE sourceType WHEN 1 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 2 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 3 THEN 'href' WHEN 4 THEN 'vedio' WHEN 5 THEN 'dz' WHEN 6 THEN 'qt' WHEN 7 THEN 'nhvedio' END AS type FROM n_document WHERE status = 1 AND sourceType <> 3 AND id >= #{id} order by id limit #{number}

SELECT id, uuid, title, `desc`, CASE sourceType WHEN 1 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 2 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 3 THEN 'href' WHEN 4 THEN 'vedio' WHEN 5 THEN 'dz' WHEN 6 THEN 'qt' WHEN 7 THEN 'nhvedio' END AS type FROM n_document WHERE status = 1 AND sourceType in (1,2) AND id >= #{id} order by id limit #{number}

SELECT id, uuid, title, `desc`, CASE sourceType WHEN 1 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 2 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 3 THEN 'href' WHEN 4 THEN 'vedio' WHEN 5 THEN 'dz' WHEN 6 THEN 'qt' WHEN 7 THEN 'nhvedio' END AS type FROM n_document WHERE status = 1 AND sourceType = 6 AND id >= #{id} order by id limit #{number}

SELECT id, uuid, title, `desc`, CASE sourceType WHEN 1 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 2 THEN 'xxs' WHEN 3 THEN 'href' WHEN 4 THEN 'vedio' WHEN 5 THEN 'dz' WHEN 6 THEN 'qt' WHEN 7 THEN 'nhvedio' END AS type FROM n_document WHERE status = 1 AND sourceType = 5 AND id = >= #{id} order by id limit #{number}

update n_document
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update n_document set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update n_document set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
